text: I feel slightly ashamed of being a
United fan because it's almost like
today tells me that we're not a special
club anymore for a you know for an
English club at the pinnacle of English
Premier League football we've suddenly
done what anybody else would do with
panicked
we've got rid of a manager after one
year and a manager that I suspect
whether you think he was the right
choice - the wrong choice was chosen
basically because he can work at a
budget and let's face it we've been
listening to what's been coming out of
the old traffic boardroom since 2005
from the Glazers about this funds and
there's money there for transfers I have
yet to see it emerge really yeah and he
also wanted a number of key players
brought in and was very very
unsuccessful in the transfer market at
the end of last season and someone say
well is that his fault or is that the
chief executives for well who controls
the purse strings very interesting that
Moyes has gone Woodward is still there
and then there is that worried that if
they bring in somebody else that louis
van gaal you know the World Cups in the
way they might use that as an excuse now
or we couldn't buy anyone because of the
World Cup I am very cynical about the
Glazers you know for all the more ease
out campaign you know this has been a
ticking time bomb
ever since 2005 we've seen great players
at United go you know Ronaldo for 80
million
he wasn't replaced like with like there
was no libery coming into united there
was no iron robin we've seen Giggs come
to the end of his career there's been no
iron Robin there's not been no Ribery no
Tony Cruz bought to replace him you know
Scholz has retired well you know and we

in the market really yeah are Tory 25

interest payments and various

that money should have been reinvested

mean I'm confused because in many ways
what made United's such a unique brand
is they didn't do that they gave

Moyes might not have been the right man
how are you going to be able to tell him
to out these Christmas you know he's
been without van persie for over half
the season had vampers have been able to
play this season nearly all the games
like last season and ruin he was
available for 14 or 15 games which you
missed this season we might have scored
next to 2025 goals then we've qualified
for the Champions League so my worry is
we're now on the managerial
merry-go-round and you know it can be a

into the fire and you know it's kind of
it's taken a certain specialness away
from United now and you know if you
think well why did they give boys a job

to a Mourinho because Mourinho would

any two new midfielders I need this to
need that give me two hundred million
and you know Moyes was too loyal to say
that but that is the truth this is the
poorest united squad for 25 years and
most United fans are aware of that and

winning the league last year
